New_York.15 Broad Street: 15 Broad Street (formerly known as the Equitable Trust Building) is a former office building that has been remodeled and now contains luxury apartments. On the northeast corner of Exchange Place with entrances at 51 Exchange Place and 37 Wall Street, placing it at the very heart of the Financial District of Manhattan. In 1931, it made the list of the 20 largest office buildings in the world.
